judges: BEVILACQUA, C. J., did not participate.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.
BEVILACQUA, C. J., did not participate.

attorneys: Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Stephen Lichatin III, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., Chief, Appellate Division, for plaintiff-respondent.
Aram K. Berberian, Warwick, for defendant-petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
STATE v. Charlie HAIGH.
No. 80-471-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Dec. 11, 1980.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Stephen Lichatin III, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., Chief, Appellate Division, for plaintiff-respondent.
Aram K. Berberian, Warwick, for defendant-petitioner.
